entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Quesnel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:24 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quesnel Airport 9:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: SSE 18 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets ending early this evening then clearing. Fog patches overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing rain changing to a few rain showers or wet flurries before morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
